abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron unveils new bill to reduce illegal immigration; plan calls for speeding deportations, obligating banks to report customers who are illegal migrants and granting police authority to seize wages of those without working papers.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister David Cameron of Britain will unveil a plan on Thursday that seeks to cut the numbers of migrants coming to Britain and make it harder for foreigners to work there illegally.

headline.main: Cameron to Propose Stricter Immigration Rules in Britain
headline.print_headline: Cameron to Propose Stricter Immigration Rules in Britain

snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron of Britain will unveil a plan on Thursday that seeks to cut the numbers of migrants coming to Britain and make it harder for foreigners to work there illegally.
